Pre-Game Insights: Andrew Jett is leaning toward the New York Mets, citing Luis Severino's recent performance and the Mets' strong pitching effort against the White Sox on Sunday.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game will be played at Citi Field on Monday, September 2, 2024, at 7:10 pm.
Others: Luis Severino has recorded five or more strikeouts in each of his last six appearances with his team as a favorite against AL East opponents.
Jeff McNeil has recorded at least one hit in each of his last 10 appearances against the Red Sox.
